ivf_fresh.name: IVF Fresh Cycle
ivf_fresh.description: Complete IVF cycle with fresh embryo transfer

milestones.name: Menstrual Cycle Starts
milestones.medicalDetails: Day 1 is marked by full period flow before midday. If after midday the following day is considered day 1.
milestones.patientInsights: Normal menstrual flow
tips: Mark the exact time flow starts
Call clinic if uncertain about timing

milestones.name: Stimulation Start
milestones.medicalDetails: Daily hormone injections (FSH ± antagonist) to stimulate ovaries to grow multiple follicles.
milestones.patientInsights: Daily needles, sometimes bloating, mood swings, headaches as Estrogen starts to rise.
tips: Light exercise like walking can help with bloating

milestones.name: Monitoring Scan
milestones.medicalDetails: Ultrasound + blood test to check follicle growth and hormone levels.
milestones.patientInsights: Transvaginal ultrasound (looking for 17–22mm follicles), Adjust medication dose depending on follicle size & estrogen. may feel bloated. Follicles grow steadily.
tips: Keep a snack for after bloods if you feel faint

milestones.name: Trigger Injection
milestones.medicalDetails: hCG or Lucrin injection to mature eggs for collection. Given at a precise time 34-36 hours exactly before collection.
milestones.patientInsights: Some abdominal heaviness.

milestones.name: Egg Collection
milestones.medicalDetails: Eggs aspirated via transvaginal ultrasound under sedation.
milestones.patientInsights: Day procedure, mild cramping/bloating, spotting afterwards.

milestones.name: Fertilisation Update
milestones.medicalDetails: Eggs inseminated (IVF) or ICSI performed. Embryo growth monitored daily.
milestones.patientInsights: Phone call update, text message for lab updates on matured and fertilised number.
tips: On average, about 70-80% of collected eggs mature
About 80% of mature eggs will fertilize

milestones.name: Fresh Embryo Transfer
milestones.medicalDetails: One embryo placed into uterus via a thin catheter.
milestones.patientInsights: Feels like a pap smear, mild cramping possible.

milestones.name: Pregnancy Blood Test (BETA)
milestones.medicalDetails: hCG blood test ~10–12 days after transfer.
milestones.patientInsights: Simple blood test, results usually same day

milestones.name: Cycle Preparation
milestones.medicalDetails: Hormone tablets/patches or natural cycle tracking to prepare uterine lining.
milestones.patientInsights: Extra monitoring appointments, possible mild side effects (nausea, breast tenderness).

milestones.name: Lining Scan
milestones.medicalDetails: Ultrasound to check endometrium thickness (≥7mm ideal).
milestones.patientInsights: Transvaginal scan, can be quick and painless.
tips: Drink water beforehand if full bladder requested

milestones.name: Frozen Embryo Transfer
milestones.medicalDetails: Thawed embryo placed into uterus.
milestones.patientInsights: Same as fresh transfer, very quick.
tips: Relaxation strategies help during the wait

milestones.name: Pregnancy Blood Test (BETA)
milestones.medicalDetails: hCG blood test ~10–12 days after transfer.
milestones.patientInsights: Simple blood test, results usually same day

milestones.name: Ovulation Induction
milestones.medicalDetails: Tablets or injections to grow 1–2 follicles.
milestones.patientInsights: Similar to IVF stimulation but lighter, may still feel bloated.

milestones.name: Follicle Tracking Scan
milestones.medicalDetails: Ultrasound to confirm follicle maturity before insemination.
milestones.patientInsights: Quick scan, results discussed same day.
tips: Flexible schedule — scans may be at short notice

milestones.name: Insemination
milestones.medicalDetails: Washed sperm placed directly into uterus via catheter.
milestones.patientInsights: Feels like pap smear, some mild cramps.

milestones.name: Pregnancy Test
milestones.medicalDetails: Blood test approximately 14 days after insemination
milestones.patientInsights: Simple blood test, results same day

milestones.name: Menstrual Cycle Starts
milestones.medicalDetails: Day 1 is marked by full period flow before midday. If after midday the following day is considered day 1.
milestones.patientInsights: Normal menstrual flow
tips: Mark the exact time flow starts
Call clinic if uncertain about timing

milestones.name: Stimulation Start
milestones.medicalDetails: Daily hormone injections (FSH ± antagonist) to stimulate ovaries to grow multiple follicles.
milestones.patientInsights: Daily needles, sometimes bloating, mood swings, headaches as Estrogen starts to rise.
tips: Light exercise like walking can help with bloating

milestones.name: Monitoring Scan
milestones.medicalDetails: Ultrasound + blood test to check follicle growth and hormone levels.
milestones.patientInsights: Transvaginal ultrasound (looking for 17–22mm follicles), Adjust medication dose depending on follicle size & estrogen. may feel bloated. Follicles grow steadily.
tips: Keep a snack for after bloods if you feel faint

milestones.name: Trigger Injection
milestones.medicalDetails: hCG or Lucrin injection to mature eggs for collection. Given at a precise time 34-36 hours exactly before collection.
milestones.patientInsights: Some abdominal heaviness.

milestones.name: Egg Collection
milestones.medicalDetails: Eggs aspirated via transvaginal ultrasound under sedation. Eggs will be frozen post collection.
milestones.patientInsights: Day procedure, mild cramping/bloating, spotting afterwards.

donor_conception.name: Donor Conception
donor_conception.description: Conception using donor sperm or eggs

milestones.name: Counselling Session
milestones.medicalDetails: Mandatory counselling for recipient (and partner if applicable).
milestones.patientInsights: Explores implications of donor use for child, family, and future.

milestones.name: Donor Screening & Legal Checks
milestones.medicalDetails: Donor's infectious disease screening, genetic testing, and legal paperwork.
milestones.patientInsights: Waiting period until approval complete.
tips: Ask for clinic's donor matching wait times — they vary greatly
Use waiting time for emotional preparation

milestones.name: Donor Matching
milestones.medicalDetails: Review available donors and make selection based on preferences
milestones.patientInsights: Review donor profiles and make selection

milestones.name: Treatment Start
milestones.medicalDetails: Same steps as whichever treatment is chosen.
milestones.patientInsights: Depends on pathway selected.
tips: Seek peer support (many find donor conception emotionally complex)
